title: TP-Link 𝗧𝗮𝗽𝗼 MagCam, 2024 PCMag Editors’ Choice & Wirecutter Recommended Outdoor Security Camera, 2K, Battery, Magnetic Mount Wireless Camera, 150° FOV, SD/Cloud Storage, Person/Vehicle Detection
description: The Tapo C425 is a wire-free, battery-powered camera with a versatile magnetic mount for hassle-free installation and access. Equipped with a large capacity 10000mAh battery, the C425 provides up to 300 days of uninterrupted performance on a single charge for less maintenance and more enjoyment. Designed for indoor and outdoor use, the camera is protected from dust and liquids with its robust IP66 weatherproof rating. With 2K QHD resolution, 150° super-wide FOV (Field of View), and full-color night vision via built-in spotlights, capture sharper videos and monitor vital areas with clarity. The Tapo C425 offers free AI detection (detects people, pets, and/or vehicles), secure local & cloud storage, customizable sound & light alarms, full-duplex two-way audio, and voice-activated automation with Amazon Alexa and Google Home. Experience top-notch security and convenience with the Tapo C425, effortlessly keeping an eye on what matters, all without the need for a hub.
